info.name: FIFA Club World Cup Qatar 2019
info.description: Match page styles for Hattrick.org based on FIFA Club World Cup Qatar 2019.
info.additionalInfo: v2.0 - December 18, 2019 - Added styles for club logo; - Added styles for match overlay score and club names; - Added styles for players pitch and bench names; - Added styles for player orders; - Updated styles for match minutes; - Fixed styles for live bubble; - Fixed styles for right panel visibility; - Fixed styles for headers; - Fixed match overlay title size. v1.0 - December 17, 2019 - First release.
